Privacy Policy for Video Wizard

Last Updated: 1/8/2024

Introduction

Welcome to Video Wizard. Our module is designed to analyze YouTube videos and provide summaries based on their captions. This document outlines how we handle any information processed through our service.

Data Collection

Our module does not collect personal information from users. It functions by receiving a URL of a YouTube video and processes this information solely to extract and summarize the captions from the video. No additional data from the user is collected or stored.

Purpose of Data Use

The data (YouTube video URLs) received by our module is used exclusively for the purpose of generating summaries of the video content. This information is processed through our API to retrieve video captions, which are then analyzed to create concise summaries.

Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not share any data with third parties. The YouTube video URLs provided by users are only used for the purpose mentioned above and are not disclosed to any external entities.

Data Security

As our module does not collect personal user data, the focus of our data security is on ensuring the integrity and availability of our service. We implement industry-standard measures to protect our services from unauthorized access and use.

User Rights

Since we do not collect personal data from our users, there are limited user rights applicable. However, if users have any questions or concerns about how we handle the data related to the YouTube URLs, they are encouraged to contact us.

Compliance with Laws

Our privacy policy is designed to comply with the relevant laws and regulations where our module is used. We are committed to protecting user privacy and ensuring ethical use of data.

Policy Updates

This privacy policy may be updated from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or in the relevant laws. Users are encouraged to review this policy periodically.

Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this privacy policy or our data handling practices, please contact us at tschartman2@gmail.com.
